model_data_base.analyze.analyze_input_mapper_result module¶

This module contains methods to compare the result of the SingleCellInputMapper to the neuronet population.

model_data_base.analyze.voltage_binning module¶

Module contents¶

model_data_base.analyze.split_synapse_activation(sa, selfcheck=True, excitatory=['L6cc', 'L2', 'VPM', 'L4py', 'L4ss', 'L4sp', 'L5st', 'L6ct', 'L34', 'L6ccinv', 'L5tt', 'Generic'], inhibiotry=['SymLocal1', 'SymLocal2', 'SymLocal3', 'SymLocal4', 'SymLocal5', 'SymLocal6', 'L45Sym', 'L1', 'L45Peak', 'L56Trans', 'L23Trans', 'GenericINH', 'INH'])[source]¶

Splits synapse activation in EXC and INH component.

Assumes, that if the cell type mentioned in the column synapse_type is in the list Interface.excitatory, that the synapse is excitatory, else inhibitory.

selfcheck: Default: True. If True, it is checked that every celltype is either asigned excitatory or inhibitory
